items.name: Boss Essence
items.description: Dropped by Primal Fear Bosses. Used in crafting the Primal Fear Boss taming item.

items.name: Festive Dino Candy
items.description: A unique candy with a curious effect that few dino's can passover.

items.name: Box o' Chocolates
items.description: <RichColor Color="1, 0.5, 0.8, 1">This chocolate's delicious, despite its origins. The Island's creatures LOVE it, as it fully heals them or advances their taming!</>

items.name: Valentines Dino Candy
items.description: Has a curious effect when consumed by a dinosaur.

items.name: Bunny Egg
items.description: Put it in a Cooking Pot to craft fun costumes or place on the ground as a festive decoration!

items.name: Stolen Headstone
items.description: A headstone stolen from a graveyard.

items.name: Pumpkin
items.description: Decorate your base with this pumpkin. Can be "carved" with all manner of paints.

items.name: Scarecrow
items.description: Decorate your base with this scarecrow.  Guaranteed to scare the crows away.

items.name: Dinosaur Bone
items.description: A very ancient looking bone, must be usefull for something!

items.name: Magic Charcoal
items.description: Drag it into Raw Meat to INSTANTLY create Cooked Meat!

items.name: Apex Boss Tribute
items.description: Use this to tame a Primal Fear Apex Boss
